comment.author: 95256605@N00
comment._content: C.C. - These are amazing. Are you sure these are Fenway? I'm thinking the old Huntington Baseball grounds

comment.author: 75421381@N00
comment._content: It is definitely Fenway. A large portion of the stands, to the right of the break, burnt down in 1926 and was not rebuilt until several years later. This is a shot from Opening Day in 2008, showing all of this part of the park, and a bit more to the right: www.flickr.com/photos/falconn67/2400472648/
